document_data.mainbody:
Loklee Street was a street in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate that began in Heapside and curved to Eastway.The game does not specify how long the street was, this article presumes Loklee Street was a long continuous street that ended in a Y crossing in Eastway.
thumb|A map of Loklee Street, showing the location of Tavs home.|270x270px
Loklee Street got its name from from one of the earliest names of Baldurs Gate sometime before 0 DR. Circa the summer of the , the adventuring detective named Tav lived on Loklee Street.
